ds.util
Class Nodes

java.lang.Object
  ds.util.Nodes

public class Nodes
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a method to remove a node from a singly linked list; it also has the method toString that describes the elements in the list.

Constructor Summary
Nodes()
           
 
Method Summary
static
<T> Node<T>
remove(Node<T> front, T target)
          Deletes the first occurrence of the target in the linked list referenced by front if it exists.
static
<T> java.lang.String
toString(Node<T> front)
          Returns a string representation of the singly-linked list specified by front.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Nodes

public Nodes()
Method Detail

toString

public static <T> java.lang.String toString(Node<T> front)
Returns a string representation of the singly-linked list specified by front. The representation is a comma separated list from front to back, enclosed in square brackets.

Parameters:
front - Node reference that identifies the list.
Returns:
a string that specifies the elements in the list.

remove

public static <T> Node<T> remove(Node<T> front,
                                 T target)
Deletes the first occurrence of the target in the linked list referenced by front if it exists. Returns the resulting value of front which may have been changed if target matches the first element in the list.
